trends.name: AI Revolution
trends.description: The AI sector is transitioning from speculative hype to a phase of massive capital consolidation and practical utility refinement.
key_catalysts: High-value M&A activity and strategic partnerships involving Nvidia and SoftBank
Continuous product evolution and UX personalization in generative AI tools
Structural integration of AI into governance and professional labor markets

trends.name: Obesity Drugs
trends.description: The shift from injectable to oral delivery and expansion into non-obesity indications (addiction) are significantly broadening the addressable market.
key_catalysts: FDA approval of oral GLP-1 formulations for weight management
Clinical expansion into addiction treatment indications
Strategic price reductions to capture high-volume emerging markets like China

trends.name: Nuclear Renaissance
trends.description: Nuclear energy is transitioning from a legacy utility play to a critical high-growth infrastructure component for the AI revolution.
key_catalysts: AI data center energy demand
Institutional capital inflow into SMR developers
Global commercialization of Small Modular Reactors

trends.name: Cybersecurity
trends.description: The cybersecurity landscape is shifting from external perimeter defense to a crisis of internal trust and supply chain integrity.
key_catalysts: Rise of insider threats and rogue cybersecurity professionals
Critical supply chain vulnerabilities in global manufacturing
Massive scale data breaches impacting consumer privacy and corporate IP

trends.name: Crypto Bull
trends.description: Massive institutional capital inflows into ETFs and staking are creating significant supply-side pressure on major cryptocurrencies.
key_catalysts: XRP ETF inflows exceeding $1 billion
Bitmine's $1 billion Ethereum staking supply squeeze
Institutional and political adoption of digital assets

trends.name: Quantum Computing
trends.description: The shift from large-scale laboratory setups to miniaturized, chip-integrated quantum hardware is accelerating the path to commercial viability.
key_catalysts: Miniaturization of quantum processors to chip-scale dimensions
Geopolitical competition for technological supremacy between US and China
Strategic R&D localization in innovation hubs like New York

trends.name: Space Economy
trends.description: L'économie spatiale transitionne d'une phase d'exploration à une phase de maturité commerciale compétitive, centrée sur la cadence de lancement et la viabilité environnementale.
key_catalysts: Accélération du calendrier des missions spatiales prévues pour 2026
Intensification de la concurrence commerciale chinoise via des startups comme LandSpace
Émergence de solutions technologiques pour la durabilité orbitale et la gestion des débris

trends.name: Reshoring
trends.description: Operational vulnerabilities in global supply chains, including cyberattacks and theft, are intensifying the strategic push toward reshoring and domestic control.
key_catalysts: Cybersecurity risks in overseas manufacturing hubs
Increasing logistics security threats and cargo theft
Consolidation of domestic construction and building material supply chains
